Class _DrawingItem

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--_DrawingItem
public class _DrawingItem
extends java.lang.Object

Holds information about a particular element int the display list for a Drawing.

Author:
C. Vickery

Field Summary
 java.lang.String elementType
          A word that names the shape to be drawn, "Line," "Rectangle," or "Circle."
 int x1
          Coordinates of the first endpoint of a line, the upper left corner of a rectangle, or the center of a circle.
 int x2
          Coordinates of the second endpoint of a line, or the width and height of a rectangle, or the diameter of a circle (repeated twice).

          Coordinates of the first endpoint of a line, the upper left corner of a rectangle, or the center of a circle.
